displayName.japanese: デミヘイム　クリア！

description.english: Oh! You put Devil King Freyr in his place, and returned Mjolnir to the Queen!
description.japanese: おお！ 魔王フレイを倒してミョルニルを取り戻した！

displayName.japanese: ビスヘイム　クリア！

description.english: Ho ho! You put down Devil King Fenrir, and returned Mistilteinn to the Queen!
description.japanese: ほっほう！魔王フェンリルを倒してミストルティンを取り戻した！

displayName.japanese: ボンヘイム　クリア！

description.english: Heroes! You defeated Devil King Hel and returned Gjallarhorn to the Queen! No one can claim your nails!
description.japanese: 勇者隊！魔王ヘルを倒してギャラルホルンを取り戻した！誰にも勇者隊の両手両足の爪を盗まれないぞ!

displayName.japanese: ヨーヘイム　クリア！

description.english: In the arena, sweat flew, muscles crashed, and in the end you overcame Devil King Surtr! Huzzah! You returned Laevateinn to the Queen.
description.japanese: 闘技場では汗が飛び筋肉がぶつかり、最後には魔王スルトに勝利した！よいぞ！レーヴァテインを取り戻した。

displayName.japanese: マギヘイム　クリア！

description.english: Ho ho! Heroes! You have brought an end to Devil King Norn! ...Who was that, again? You returned Brisingamen to the Queen.
description.japanese: ほっほう！勇者隊！魔王ノルンに終止符を打ったのだ！...ノルンってだれだったっけ？ブリーシンガを取り戻した。

displayName.japanese: バンヘイム　クリア！

description.english: Oh brave heroes! You timed your attacks well and crushed Devil King Jormungandr! You returned Sleipnir to the Queen.
description.japanese: ほっほう！勇者隊！ちゃんと有利なタイミングを狙って魔王ヨルムンガンドを押しつぶしたのだ！スレイプニルを取り戻した。

displayName.japanese: デスヘイム　クリア！

description.english: Heroes, you defeated the nasty Devil King Loki! Heroes, you defeated the dastardly Devil King Loki! Heroes, you defeated the clever Devil King Loki! That was exhausting, wasn't it? You returned Gungnir to the Queen.
description.japanese: 勇者隊　いけすかん魔王ロキを倒した！勇者隊　卑怯な魔王ロキを倒した！勇者隊　頭が切れる魔王ロキを倒した！疲れているじゃろう？グングニルを取り戻した。

displayName.japanese: 全ての隠し界層　クリア！

description.english: Heroes! You defeated all the Minor Devil Kings and gathered all of the Einherjar fragments! I knew you were the true heroes!
description.japanese: 勇者隊！キミたちは　全ての小魔王を倒して秘宝エインヘリヤルの欠片らを集めたようだな！やはり　キミたちこそ真の勇者だった。

displayName.japanese: オルヘイム　クリア！

description.english: {...Ho ho! Brave heroes!...} {...You have done it!...} {...You have defeated the True Devil King and saved the Land of Fairies!...}
description.japanese: 《……なんと　勇者隊よ！……》《……真の魔王オル＝ディンを倒して妖精の国を救った！……》《……見事であった！……》

displayName.japanese: 製図家の初めの一歩

description.english: Ho ho! You found your first Map Beetle! Make the most of its magic!
description.japanese: ほっほう！初めての地図の虫を見つけたじゃな。うまく活用するんじゃぞ。

displayName.japanese: 虫とり

description.english: Oink! You found your first Scarab Beetle! I'll take it, please! Hyoink!
description.japanese: ブー　初めての黄金虫を見つけたんだネ。それじゃあ　頂いちゃうヨ！ブヒ！

displayName.japanese: ものコレクター

description.english: Oh! It seems like you've collected a great deal of stuff on your adventure! You established yourself as a collector of D-rarity weapons and armor.
description.japanese: おお！冒険の途中で多くのものを集めたようじゃな。Dランクの剣や鎧のコレクターとして確立した！

displayName.japanese: 良いものコレクター

description.english: Ho ho! It seems like you've collected a great deal of items on your adventure! You established yourself as a collector of C-rarity weapons and armor.
description.japanese: ほっほう！冒険の途中で多くの良いものを集めたようじゃな。Cランクの剣や鎧のコレクターとして確立した！

displayName.japanese: 珍しいものコレクター

description.english: Heroes! It seems like you've collected a great deal of rarities on your adventure! You established yourself as a collector of B-rarity weapons and armor.
description.japanese: 勇者隊！冒険の途中で多くの珍しいものを集めたようじゃな。Ｂランクの剣や鎧のコレクターとして確立した！

displayName.japanese: 貴重なものコレクター

description.english: Brave heroes! It seems like you've collected a great deal of precious items on your adventure! You established yourself as a collector of A-rarity weapons and armor.
description.japanese: 勇者隊！冒険の途中で多くの貴重なものを集めたようじゃな。Ａランクの剣や鎧のコレクターとして確立した！

displayName.japanese: 素晴らしい宝物コレクター

description.english: You have done it brave heroes! It seems like you've collected a great trove of wonderful treasure on your adventure! You established yourself as a collector of S-rarity weapons and armor.
description.japanese: ほっほう！やりおるのう 勇者隊！冒険の途中で多くの素晴らしい宝物を集めたようじゃな。Ｓランクの剣や鎧のコレクターとして確立した！

displayName.japanese: 冒険者？

description.english: You cleared a dungeon with a D rank.
description.japanese: 迷宮をDランクでクリアしました！

displayName.japanese: 勇者隊？

description.english: Oh! You cleared a dungeon with a C rank. Well done!
description.japanese: なんと迷宮をCランクでクリアしました！この調子で頑張ってくださいね。

displayName.japanese: 勇者隊！

description.english: Heroes! You have cleared a dungeon with a B rank. Thank you for all your help!
description.japanese: 勇者隊！迷宮をBランクでクリアしました！私たちのために頑張ってくれてありがとうね。

displayName.japanese: 大勇者隊！

description.english: Brave heroes! You have braved your way though and cleared a dungeon with an A rank. There is hope for the land of Fairies!
description.japanese: 勇者隊のみなさん...迷宮をAランクでクリアしました！みなさんは　私たちの国の希望です。

displayName.japanese: 妖精の国の希望！

description.english: My heroes...! You have mustered all your courage and cleared a dungeon with an S rank. You will surely save the Land of Fairies!
description.japanese: 勇者隊のみなさん...胸に宿るその勇気で迷宮をSランクでクリアした！勇者隊はきっと妖精の国をお救いします。

displayName.japanese: ティル・ナ・バルクの真の勇者

description.english: My heroes... You have obtained all the achievements! I shall compose an epic of your deeds. It shall be passed down through generations until the end of time.
description.japanese: 勇者隊のみなさん…全ての実績を解除しました！私が詩にして未来の果てまで語りつぐことといたしましょう。
